Understate: The claim understates the fact that Secretary of State Mike Pompeo did not publicly defend former ambassador Marie Yovanovitch.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or record of Pompeo publicly defending Yovanovitch.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Pompeo's statement of defending "every single person on this team" includes Yovanovitch, even though there is no specific mention or evidence of him defending her.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that Pompeo's statement of defending "every single person on this team" refers to a general defense of State Department officials without specifically defending Yovanovitch.
